title: Senior Account Executive
content:
Precisely is the leader in data integrity. We empower businesses to make more confident decisions based on trusted data through a unique combination of software, data enrichment products and strategic services. What does this mean to you? For starters, it means joining a company focused on delivering outstanding innovation and support that helps customers increase revenue, lower costs and reduce risk. In fact, Precisely powers better decisions for more than 12,000 global organizations, including 99 of the Fortune 100. Precisely's 2500 employees are unified by four company core values that are central to who we are and how we operate: Openness, Determination, Individuality, and Collaboration. We are committed to career development for our employees and offer opportunities for growth, learning and building community. With a "work from anywhere" culture, we celebrate diversity in a distributed environment with a presence in 30 countries as well as 20 offices in over 5 continents. Learn more about why it's an exciting time to join Precisely!PURPOSE OF THE POSITION 
The Senior Account Executive will help achieve maximum sales profitability, market penetration and growth within the United Kingdom and Ireland Data Integrity Market. This will be done by effectively prospecting to new target accounts and building existing accounts to meet Precisely’s rapid growth plans and expand our global presence as leaders in data integrity.
ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES - Other duties may be assigned 

Learn, understand and convey Precisely’s products capabilities and benefits
Communicate Precisely’s value proposition to the Insurance industry to drive insightful client engagements across various business functions (i.e. IT Operations, Core Business Units, Analytics and Compliance.)
Drive pipeline growth through effective prospecting and lead generation activities
Build and manage all stages of sales pipeline to consistently achieve or exceed monthly, quarterly and annual targets (prospecting through to deal closing)
Develop and execute actions and business plans to generate revenue for new business within assigned territory
Build and uphold a high level of client experience across assigned territory
Plan, execute and document sales steps utilizing Precisely’s CRM on a daily basis
Provide accurate forecasting and reporting to Sales leaders
Work closely with Precisely’s Pre-sales, Professional Services & Value Engineering teams to create compelling business propositions based on Precisely solutions
Contribute to market strategy by monitoring market data, competitive products and prospect feedback
Convey product feature requests to Product Management team
Deliver forecasting demand, client launches and revenue on an ongoing and consistent basis

ESSENTIAL EDUCATION, SKILLS AND KNOWLEDGE REQUIREMENTS:  

Ability to build relationships at all levels with prospects, customers, partners and within Precisely
Excellent selling skills and the ability to close business
Self-starter with strong planning, technical and administrative proficiencies
Excellent verbal, written communication and presentation skills
Strong business and operations acumen especially within the insurance industry
Strong analytical, problem solving, and time management skills
Good business maturity, negotiating and decision-making skills 
Basic to intermediate technical understanding of information and communication technologies concepts and architecture
Ability to accurately prioritize and manage time/resources for maximum efficiency and productivity

PREFERRED REQUIREMENTS:  

Bachelor's degree, Business or related field, or equivalent experience
Demonstrated experience (preferred 5+ years ) in enterprise software sales
Experience in data management, applications, IT platforms
Understanding of some or all of the following software solutions areas : Data Governance, Data Quality, Data Observability, Enrichment data, Data Integration, Location Intelligence, Analytic Cloud Datawarehouse

#LI-PW1  #LI-Remote

demographic_questions.description: We are required to compile the following information for statistical purposes in order to comply with certain federal regulations relating to Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action requirements. The information you provide is strictly on a voluntary basis, and the content of the information will not affect your eligibility for employment. Likewise, if you choose not to provide this information it will not affect your eligibility for employment in any way.

answer_options.label: Hispanic or Latino - A person of Cuban, Mexican, Puerto Rican, South or Central American, or other Spanish culture or origin regardless of race.
White (not Hispanic or Latino) - A person having origins in any of the original peoples of Europe, the Middle East, or North Africa.
Black or African American (not Hispanic or Latino) - A person having origins in any of the black racial groups of Africa.
Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander (not Hispanic or Latino) - A person having origins in any of the peoples of Hawaii, Guam, Samoa, or other Pacific Islands.

Asian (not Hispanic or Latino) - A person having origins in any of the original peoples of the Far East, Southeast Asia, or the Indian Subcontinent, including, for example, Cambodia, China, India, Japan, Korea, Malaysia, Pakistan, the Philippine Islands,

American Indian or Alaska Native (not Hispanic or Latino) - A person having origins in any of the original peoples of North and South America (including Central America ), and who maintain tribal affiliation or community attachment.

Two or More Races (not Hispanic or Latino) - A person who identifies with more than one of the following, as defined above: White; Black or African American; Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander; Asian; or American Indian or Alaska Native.

questions.label: Do you think of yourself as:

Do you now, or will you in the future, require a visa or any type of immigration sponsorship for work authorization in the country you are working from (e.g., H-1B, OPT, F1, dependent visa)?  (if hired, verification will be required consistent with federal law.)

If you answered yes to the above question, you have now or will require future immigration sponsorship, please state the type visa or sponsorship you have now or will require along with the expiration date of current status.
Do you have any relatives employed by this organization?
How did you hear about us?
